alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:21PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo County through 700 PM MDT... At 621 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Alamo Hueco, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Playas Valley and Hachita Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
